bibl.title: Gallus Restartus (Restoration of Latin Papyrus from Qasr Ibrîm).
bibl.note: Restitue les vers 8-9 et confirme l'attribution à Cornelius Gallus.
Griffith John G., Gallus Restartus (Restoration of Latin Papyrus from Qasr Ibrîm).
John G. Griffith, Festinat senex, or An Old Man in a Hurry (Oxford, 1988) pp. 64-69.
